name: Something is odd
description:
Something is odd is a game made for the GMTK gamejam.

it was made in 48 hours with the theme: Joinned together.

You play two Stikmans at the same time and need to bring each to a button.

That can resut in some dificult situation because one needs to go left but the other one right. 

When you are done with the game you can restart and try to beat your record.

have fun
